message: Hi, I’m interested in buying a sofa, but I’m not sure where to start. Can you help?

Hi. Welcome to SofaNest, my name is Chris. I’d be delighted to help you find the perfect sofa for your needs. Before we proceed, let’s run through security. Could you confirm your email address and name for me?
Sure, it’s alex.jones@example.com, and my name is Alex Jones.
Thank you, Alex. That’s all correct. Let me recap: your name is Alex Jones, and your email is alex.jones@example.com. Is that right?
Yes, that’s correct.
Great! Let’s talk about what works for you. For starters, are you looking for a 3-Seater with chaise or something like a modular LAF configuration?
Um… sorry, what’s an LAF configuration?
I apologize for using internal jargon, Alex. LAF stands for Left Arm Facing, which simply means the longer side of the sofa extends to the left when you’re facing it. Does that make sense?
Ah, okay, got it now! I think I’d prefer the longer side on the right, though.
Thanks for clarifying! So, you’d prefer a RAF configuration, or Right Arm Facing. Have there been any specific styles or materials you’ve been considering?
I’d love a fabric sofa, something modern in gray or beige.
Can you give me an idea of your living room size, so we can ensure the sofa fits perfectly?
It’s about 15 feet by 18 feet.
What would you consider the most important feature—comfort, style, or durability?
Comfort, for sure. I want something really cozy to relax on.

I completely understand. Based on what you’ve shared, I’d recommend our ‘PlushNest’ sectional sofa. It’s a modular fabric sofa in gray and beige options with a Right Arm Facing configuration. It’s designed for maximum comfort and fits your space beautifully. Would you like me to send swatches or share details on pricing?
Yes, please send the swatches!
Absolutely! I’ll arrange for the swatches to be delivered to your email within 24 hours. Is there anything else I can assist you with today?
No, that’s all for now. Thanks so much for your help!
You’re very welcome, Alex. I’ll follow up with the swatches shortly. Have a wonderful day, and thank you for choosing SofaNest!
